sentence.Network_en: Therapeutics is considered in virtually all textbooks of medicine, but often superficially.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: plural of earlier therapeutic (noun), from French thérapeutique, or via late Latin from Greek therapeutika, neuter plural (used as a noun) of therapeutikos (see therapeutic)
